
---== EPIC DORIAN ==---

M RUNS $ 1
INS 2 AND 4 TRIGGER PITCHES
OUT OF CVS 1 AND 2
CV 3 IS BASS



#1
X R10110101011
Y RRAND 0 8
N.B Y X
CV 3 N.B 1

#2
CV 1 N.B RRAND 1 16

#3

#4
CV 2 N.B RRAND 1 16

#5

#6

#7

#8

#M
EV 20: $ 1

#I
$ 1
CV.SLEW 1 20; CV.SLEW 2 20
M 1000; M.ACT 1
CV.SLEW 3 100

#P
0	0	0	0
1	1	1	1
